text: Takheun han sapeue milek lon nyang sah Got nyang munaphaâ€™at got nyang meularat Bandum cit meuhat ban kheundak Allah Sangkira lon nyoe teupeue nyang ghaeb Han le lon peutrep sagai lam sosah Sabe lam seunang han tom meularat Nyoe dilon meuhat cit ba peurintah Haba peutakot haba peusuka Keu kaom nyang na iman keu Allah
